attributes.action: Protect the rights of UK citizens that do not receive the coronavirus vaccine.
attributes.additional_details:
Non vaccinated UK CITIZENS should and will enjoy the same rights and freedoms as vaccinated citizens. Non vaccinated citizens should not have their human rights diluted or be treated  any different to any other UK citizen..in Law non vaccinated and vaccinated citizens to be treated equally. The personal medical history of vaccination data to be protected by law and remain private.
To treat a non vaccinated citizen any differently to a vaccinated citizen should be made unlawful.
attributes.background:
Protect in law the rights of non vaccinated citizens so that they receive the same rights/protections as vaccinated citizens.
To put in law protections against discrimination and enhanced data protection of non vaccinated citizens.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442

Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957
